Package com.what2see.repository.tour

Interface TourRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Tour,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Tour,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<Tour,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<Tour,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Tour,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Tour>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Tour,Long>
@Repository public interface TourRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Tour,Long>
Repository that provides CRUD operations for Tour entities.

  • Method Details

    • searchPublicOrSharedWith

      @Query("SELECT t FROM Tour t LEFT JOIN t.tags tt LEFT JOIN t.sharedTourists ttt WHERE (t.isPublic = true OR ttt = :sharedWith) AND (:city IS NULL OR t.city = :city) AND (:theme IS NULL OR t.theme = :theme) AND (:approxDuration IS NULL OR t.approxDuration <= :approxDuration)") List<Tour> searchPublicOrSharedWith(City city, Theme theme, String approxDuration, Tourist sharedWith)
      Searches for tours that are public or shared with the given tourist.
      Parameters:
      city - city filter (optional)
      theme - theme filter (optional)
      approxDuration - maximum duration filter (optional)
      sharedWith - tourist to check if tour is shared with (NOT optional)
      Returns:
      list of tours that match the given criteria

    • searchPublicOrCreatedBy

      @Query("SELECT t FROM Tour t LEFT JOIN t.tags tt WHERE (t.isPublic = TRUE OR t.author = :author) AND (:city IS NULL OR t.city = :city) AND (:theme IS NULL OR t.theme = :theme) AND (:approxDuration IS NULL OR t.approxDuration <= :approxDuration)") List<Tour> searchPublicOrCreatedBy(City city, Theme theme, String approxDuration, Guide author)
      Searches for tours that are public or created by the given guide.
      Parameters:
      city - city filter (optional)
      theme - theme filter (optional)
      approxDuration - maximum duration filter (optional)
      author - guide to check if tour is created by (NOT optional)
      Returns:
      list of tours that match the given criteria

    • searchAll

      @Query("SELECT t FROM Tour t LEFT JOIN t.tags tt WHERE (:city IS NULL OR t.city = :city) AND (:theme IS NULL OR t.theme = :theme) AND (:approxDuration IS NULL OR t.approxDuration <= :approxDuration)") List<Tour> searchAll(City city, Theme theme, String approxDuration)
      Searches for tours without considering their visibility status.
      It is intended to only be used by administrators.
      Parameters:
      city - city filter (optional)
      theme - theme filter (optional)
      approxDuration - maximum duration filter (optional)
      Returns:
      list of tours that match the given criteria

    • findAllByReported

      @Query("SELECT t from Tour t LEFT JOIN t.reports r WHERE (:isReported = TRUE AND r.id <> NULL) OR (:isReported = FALSE AND r.id = NULL)") List<Tour> findAllByReported(boolean isReported)
      Searched for tours that have at least one report or none.
      Parameters:
      isReported - whether to search for tours with reports or without
      Returns:
      list of tours that match the given criteria
